text: Gabriel Nunes da Cunha (born July 11, 1994), known as Gabriel Nunes, is a Brazilian footballer who plays in Italy for Siena as midfielder. ==Club career== On 26 February 2020, he signed with Italian Serie C club Padova until the end of the 2019–20 season, with the club holding an option to renew the contract. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |-
